page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {LAW AND ORDER}In Coggeshall we have two Community policemen P.C Oxlade and P.C Clarke.Their uniform is a helmet, navy suit with silver buttons a blue shirt,black tie and black shoes.They both have a car whic are radio controlled so they can ring up the station.When they are walking the beat they have a'walkie talkie'in case of emergency.P.C Oxlade and P.C Clarke come to our school to warn us not to go with strangers by showing us a film They protect property by checking shops,houses,factories and offices. They make sure all doors are locked and secured.We also have traffic wardens to make sure cars aren't parked on double yellow lines.If they are they get a fine ticket.They make sure that cars are parked in the free car park.
